conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true cutaway 3D model: walls have height/thickness, multiple wall faces are visible, interior volumes read as rooms, and the viewpoint is an elevated angled/isometric-like perspective with the roof/ceiling removed.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D extrusion with readable corners, thickness, and room volumes; clean cutaway. Minor softness/rounding in some edges and simplified wall-top treatment reduces geometric crispness slightly.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall room count and adjacency largely match (central living/dining, kitchen below, multiple bedrooms along the perimeter, bathroom cluster near center-right, decks along the top). Some proportional drift and a few partitions/openings appear simplified compared to the 2D plan, especially around the bathroom/utility corridor zone and deck edge detailing.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture is present (sofa/coffee table, dining table, beds), with kitchen counters and bathroom fixtures represented. A few items are simplified and some bedroom furnishing (e.g., bed type/count) appears generalized relative to the plan.

visual_clarity.notes: Walls/floors are distinguishable and the model is readable. Lighting is adequate but somewhat flat/washed, and window/door geometry is not consistently emphasized, which slightly reduces opening clarity.

detected_errors.description: Minor-to-moderate proportional drift and simplification of internal partitions compared to the 2D plan, most noticeable in the central bathroom/utility/corridor region.
Some doors/windows/openings are simplified or not clearly positioned to match every opening shown in the 2D plan.
Furniture is largely correct by room type, but some bedroom furniture/bed configuration appears generalized rather than matching the 2D depiction exactly.
Slightly flat lighting and soft edge definition reduce crispness of architectural elements (especially openings).

summary: A clear, valid cutaway 3D conversion with strong overall layout fidelity, with only moderate simplification of partitions/openings and slight proportion drift in a few zones.
